CustomField.description: The unit used to track this service. For example: hours, meals, sessions, deliveries, kits, etc. This is a formula field that displays the UnitOfMeasurement__c field from the Service object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The unit used to track this service. For example: hours, meals, sessions, deliveries, kits, etc. This is a formula field that displays the UnitOfMeasurement__c field from the Service object.
CustomField.label: Unit of Measurement
